memberSignatures.value: public SchemaBuilder (Chr.Avro.Abstract.TemporalBehavior temporalBehavior = Chr.Avro.Abstract.TemporalBehavior.Iso8601, Chr.Avro.Resolution.ITypeResolver typeResolver = null);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype Chr.Avro.Abstract.TemporalBehavior temporalBehavior, class Chr.Avro.Resolution.ITypeResolver typeResolver) cil managed

parameters.name: temporalBehavior
parameters.summary:
Whether the builder should build string schemas (ISO 8601) or long schemas (timestamp
            logical types) for timestamp resolutions.

parameters.name: typeResolver
parameters.summary:
A resolver to retrieve type information from. If no resolver is provided, the schema
            builder will use the default <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.DataContractResolver" />.
